column1: The university offers interdisciplinary graduate study and more than 100 undergraduate majors in four colleges.
He is a UCF graduate, a Michigan native and an avid golfer.
This blog is an attempt to offer those considering graduate school some good reasons to do something else.
Graduate school is not school in any sense that you have experienced school before.
From the moment that you begin your existence as a graduate student, you have to worry about your courses, your labor obligations.
Americans tend to define themselves by their careers, but graduate students don't have careers.
But graduate school can only offer the hope of an academic career.
Some of them come back to life when they graduate or leave academia.
Graduate school has taught me great time management but has given me a dull life.
It's a bit of denial that keeps graduate students going into subjects that don't pay off.
